parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per microbiology specimen finding per time point per visit per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.FOCID

datasetVariables.description: Identification of a focus of study-specific interest on or within a subject or specimen as called out in the protocol for which a measurement, test, or examination was performed. The value in this variable should have inherent semantic meaning.
datasetVariables.label: Focus of Study-Specific Interest
datasetVariables.name: FOCID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness of records within a dataset for a subject. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: MBSEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Optional group identifier, used to link together a block of related records within a subject in a domain.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: MBGRPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external specimen identifier (e.g., sample ID for a subject sample from which a microbial culture was generated).
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: MBREFID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps preprinted on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MBSPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBLNKID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related records across domains. This may be a one-to-one or a one-to-many relationship.
datasetVariables.label: Link ID
datasetVariables.name: MBLNKID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBLNKGRP

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related records across domains. This will usually be a many-to-one relationship.
datasetVariables.label: Link Group ID
datasetVariables.name: MBLNKGRP

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBTESTCD

self.title: Microbiology Test or Finding Short Name

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or finding described in MBTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in MBTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). MBTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: "MCORGIDN" for Microbial Organism Identification, "GMNCOC" for Gram Negative Cocci.
datasetVariables.label: Microbiology Test or Finding Short Name
datasetVariables.name: MBTESTCD

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBTEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the test or examination used to obtain the measurement or finding. The value in MBTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: "Microbial Organism Identification", "Gram Negative Cocci", "HIV-1 RNA".
datasetVariables.label: Microbiology Test or Finding Name
datasetVariables.name: MBTEST

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBTSTDTL

datasetVariables.description: Further description of MBTESTCD and MBTEST. Examples: "VIRAL LOAD" (when MBTESTCD represents viral genetic material, such as "HCRNA"), "QUANTIFICATION" (when MBTESTCD represents any organism being quantified).
datasetVariables.label: Measurement, Test or Examination Detail
datasetVariables.name: MBTSTDTL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of related records.
datasetVariables.label: Category
datasetVariables.name: MBCAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a further categorization of MBCAT values.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory
datasetVariables.name: MBSCAT

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBORRES

self.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

datasetVariables.description: Result of the Microbiology measurement or finding as originally received or collected. Examples for "GRAM STAIN" findings: "+3 MODERATE", "+2 FEW", "<10". Examples for "CULTURE PLATE" findings: "KLEBSIELLA PNEUMONIAE", "STREPTOCOCCUS PNEUMONIAE".
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
datasetVariables.name: MBORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBORRESU

datasetVariables.description: Original unit for MBORRES. Example: "mg/mL".
datasetVariables.label: Original Units
datasetVariables.name: MBORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSTRESC

self.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings; copied or derived from MBORRES in a standard format or standard units. MBSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in MBSTRESN. For example, if a test has results "+3 MODERATE", "MOD", and "MODERATE" in MBORRES and these results effectively have the same meaning, they could be represented in standard format in MBSTRESC as "MODERATE".
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding in Standard Format
datasetVariables.name: MBSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from MBSTRESC. MBSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: MBSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized units used for MBSTRESC and MBSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: MBSTRESU

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBRESCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to categorize the result of a finding in a standard format.
datasetVariables.label: Result Category
datasetVariables.name: MBRESCAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that a question was not asked or a test was not done, or that a test was attempted but did not generate a result. Should be null or have a value of "NOT DONE".
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: MBSTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBREASND

datasetVariables.description: Reason not done. Used in conjunction with MBSTAT when value is "NOT DONE". Examples: "BROKEN EQUIPMENT", "TECHNICIAN OVERSIGHT".
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: MBREASND

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBNAM

datasetVariables.description: Name or identifier of the vendor (e.g., laboratory) that provided the test results.
datasetVariables.label: Laboratory/Vendor Name
datasetVariables.name: MBNAM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C77529

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSPEC

datasetVariables.description: Defines the type of specimen used for a measurement. Examples: "BLOOD", "PUS".
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Material Type
datasetVariables.name: MBSPEC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBSPCCND

datasetVariables.description: Free or standardized text describing the condition of the specimen. Example: "CONTAMINATED".
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Condition
datasetVariables.name: MBSPCCND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C74456

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBLOC

datasetVariables.description: Anatomical location relevant to the collection of the measurement.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Collection Location
datasetVariables.name: MBLOC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99073

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBLAT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for specimen collection location further detailing laterality. Examples: "RIGHT", "LEFT", "BILATERAL".
datasetVariables.label: Laterality
datasetVariables.name: MBLAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99074

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBDIR

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for specimen collection location further detailing directionality. Examples: "ANTERIOR", "LOWER", "PROXIMAL".
datasetVariables.label: Directionality
datasetVariables.name: MBDIR

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBMETHOD

datasetVariables.description: Method of the test or examination. Example: "GRAM STAIN","MICROBIAL CULTURE, LIQUID", "QUANTITATIVE REVERSE TRANSCRIPTASE POLYMERASE CHAIN REACTION".
datasetVariables.label: Method of Test or Examination
datasetVariables.name: MBMETHOD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBLOBXFL

datasetVariables.description: Operationally derived indicator used to identify the last non-missing value prior to RFXSTDTC. The value should be "Y" or null.
datasetVariables.label: Last Observation Before Exposure Flag
datasetVariables.name: MBLOBXFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBBLFL

datasetVariables.description: Indicator used to identify a baseline value. Should be "Y" or null. Note that MBBLFL is retained for backward compatibility. The authoritative baseline for statistical analysis is in an ADaM dataset.
datasetVariables.label: Baseline Flag
datasetVariables.name: MBBLFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBFAST

datasetVariables.description: Indicator used to identify fasting status. Valid values include "Y", "N", "U", or null if not relevant.
datasetVariables.label: Fasting Status
datasetVariables.name: MBFAST

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBDRVFL

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate a derived record (e.g., a record that represents the average of other records such as a computed baseline). Should be "Y" or null.
datasetVariables.label: Derived Flag
datasetVariables.name: MBDRVFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBRSTIND

datasetVariables.description: An indicator as to whether the subject was restrained during the intervention period.
datasetVariables.label: Restraint Indicator
datasetVariables.name: MBRSTIND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C158123

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBRSTMOD

datasetVariables.description: A description of whether the restraint was physical and/or chemical.
datasetVariables.label: Restraint Mode
datasetVariables.name: MBRSTMOD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of specimen collection.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Collection
datasetVariables.name: MBDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBDY

datasetVariables.description:
Study day of the specimen collection, measured as integer days. 
 Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics. This formula should be consistent across the submission.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Visit/Collection/Exam
datasetVariables.name: MBDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBNOMDY

datasetVariables.description: Nominal study day used for grouping records for observations that may occur on different days into a single reported study day. Should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Nominal Study Day for Tabulations
datasetVariables.name: MBNOMDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBNOMLBL

datasetVariables.description: A label for a given value of MBNOMDY as presented in the study report. Examples: "Week 4", "Day 28".
datasetVariables.label: Label for Nominal Study Day
datasetVariables.name: MBNOMLBL

modelClassVariable.title: Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBXDY

self.title: Day of Collection Rel to Exp

datasetVariables.description: Day of specimen collection relative to the first date of exposure to study treatment (RFXSTDTC in Demographics). Must be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Day of Collection Rel to Exp
datasetVariables.name: MBXDY

modelClassVariable.title: Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBCHDY

self.title: Day of Collection Rel to Chall Agent

datasetVariables.description: Day of specimen collection relative to the first date of exposure to challenge agent (RFCSTDTC in Demographics). Must be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Day of Collection Rel to Chall Agent
datasetVariables.name: MBCHDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBTPT

datasetVariables.description:
Text description of time when specimen should be taken. 
 This may be represented as an elapsed time relative to a fixed reference point, such as time of last dose. See MBTPTNUM and MBTPTREF. Examples: "Start", "5 min post".
datasetVariables.label: Planned Time Point Name
datasetVariables.name: MBTPT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBTPTNUM

datasetVariables.description: Numeric version of MBTPT used in sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Time Point Number
datasetVariables.name: MBTPTNUM

modelClassVariable.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBELTM

self.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

datasetVariables.description: Planned elapsed time (in ISO 8601) relative to a planned fixed reference (MBTPTREF). This variable is useful where there are repetitive measures. Not a clock time or a date time variable. Represented as an ISO 8601 duration. Examples: "-PT15M" to represent the period of 15 minutes prior to the reference point indicated by MBTPTREF, or "PT8H" to represent the period of 8 hours after the reference point indicated by MBTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref
datasetVariables.name: MBELTM

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBTPTREF

datasetVariables.description: Name of the fixed reference point referred to by MBELTM, MBTPTNUM, and MBTPT. Example: "PREVIOUS DOSE".
datasetVariables.label: Time Point Reference
datasetVariables.name: MBTPTREF

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MB.MBRFTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time for a fixed reference time point, MBTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: MBRFTDTC
